column1: The '''''Annual'' of Our Lady's School (1936)''' is an Annual published by Our Lady's School, [[Wikipedia:Abingdon-on-Thames
column2: Abingdon]] (near Oxford), in [[1936]]. It includes the poems "[[Shadow-Bride
column3: The Shadow Man]]" (p. 9) and "[[Noel]]" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>{{webcite
